description: Under the Constitution written by the mythical law-giver Lycurgus, the institution of The Agoge was established, where Spartans were trained from the age of 6 to be superior warriors in defense of the Spartan state.
tooltip: Spartiate Hoplites and Phalangites +10% health and cost −1 population, but +20% increased train time. Unlocks “Krypteia.”
